name: Issued Books Report
query:
SELECT
    lt.name AS "Transaction ID:Link/Library Transaction:150",
    lm.full_name AS "Member Name:Data:150",
    art.article_name AS "Article Name:Data:200",
    lt.issue_date AS "Issue Date:Date:120",
    lt.due_date AS "Due Date:Date:120",
    lt.status AS "Status:Data:120"
FROM
    `tabLibrary Transaction` lt
LEFT JOIN `tabLibrary Member` lm ON lm.name = lt.library_member
LEFT JOIN `tabArticle` art ON art.name = lt.article
WHERE
    lt.docstatus < 2
ORDER BY
    lt.name ASC;
